i18n.title: Find Branches Containing a Commit
i18n.description: In Git, branches are used to develop features or isolate changes made to a project. Sometimes, you may need to find out which branches contain a specific commit. This lab will test your ability to use Git commands to find branches containing a commit.

meta.title: Git Branches | Commit Tracking | Git Playground
meta.description: Learn how to use Git commands to find all branches that contain a specific commit in the Git Playground repository.
meta.keywords: git, branches, commits, git commands, git playground

verify.name: Verify if found successfully
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 查找包含特定提交的分支
i18n.description: 在Git中，分支用于开发功能或隔离对项目所做的更改。有时，你可能需要找出哪些分支包含特定的提交。本实验将测试你使用Git命令查找包含提交的分支的能力。

meta.title: Git分支 | 提交跟踪 | Git游乐场
meta.description: 了解如何使用Git命令在Git游乐场仓库中查找包含特定提交的所有分支。
meta.keywords: git, 分支, 提交, Git命令, Git游乐场

steps.title: 查找包含特定提交的分支

verify.name: 验证是否成功找到
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
